channel.title: Twitch Stream Crash
channel.description: so whenever a loading area pops up (ie new area) it will crash the twitch stream. sometimes i am able to restart it after its finished loading, other times i have to exit the game completely, close all the error windows from the streaming app and start it back up. I'm using the built in stream to twitch from Raptr app.
